AboutUs.aboutUsDescription: SHOP is the online store with over 100 professional makeup brands, hair care products, and Kbeauty skincare from Romania. Currently, you can find on our website only brands used by professionals, beauty salons, trainers, haircare specialists, as well as by people who use the products for personal use.
AboutUs.aboutUsBrands: What brands can you find on {store_name}?
AboutUs.aboutUsBrandsList: 50 Professional Makeup brands: Makeup Atelier Paris, Inglot, MUP, Make up For Ever, Ploise, Ardell, BPerfect etc.
AboutUs.aboutUsBrandsList2: 20 professional hair care brands: Alfaparf, L'oreal Professionel, Wella SP, Matrix Biolage, Schwarzkopf, Keune, etc.
AboutUs.aboutUsBrandsList3: 30+ Beauty Skincare brands: Cosrx, Benton, Missha, A'Pieu, Holika Holika, Bio Mer, ShangPree, Innisfree, Platen etc.
AboutUs.aboutUsCommunityDescription: Within our community, you will be able to share experiences and tips with other users, participate in discussions, and receive personalized recommendations.
AboutUs.aboutUsSocialMedia: What do you gain by following us on Facebook or Instagram?
AboutUs.aboutUsSocialMediaList: We frequently post makeup/hair care/skincare tutorials.
AboutUs.aboutUsSocialMediaList2: You can enter giveaways and contests with great prizes.
AboutUs.aboutUsSocialMediaList3: You receive tips and tricks from the biggest trainers in the field.
AboutUs.aboutUsSocialMediaList4: Be among the first to find out about our promotions!
AboutUs.aboutUsSocialMediaList5: You can receive gift vouchers for your orders.
AboutUs.aboutUsWhyOrderList: The most diverse range of brands – professional makeup and skincare.
AboutUs.aboutUsWhyOrderList4: Shipping is only {default_price} LEI, and free for orders over {free_shipping_threshold} LEI.
AboutUs.aboutUsWhyOrderList5: Our site sells only original products, no fakes.
AboutUs.aboutUsWhyOrderList6: You benefit from the best promotions for skincare and makeup!
AboutUs.aboutUsWhyOrderList7: Free and fast return for all products.

Contact.contactDescription: You can contact us by email or phone for any questions or suggestions.
Contact.contactFormThankYouDescription: We will contact you as soon as possible.

ConsentModificationRequest.consentModificationRequestDescription: Request modification of consent to be able to benefit from our services.

DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription: To ensure your order has been placed, please check your email to see if you have received the proforma invoice!
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription2: When processing your order, you will receive a phone call/message for confirmation!
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription3: Order processing and package sending takes 24h, only if placed before: 16:00 (Mon-Fri).
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription4: All orders are sent within 48 business hours, if the products are in stock.
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription5: Orders are delivered from Romania to customers, as we have official collaborations with all brands, being official distributors.
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription6: If the product is not in stock, we will notify you of the delivery time by email
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription7: For orders under {shipping_threshold} Ron, a courier fee of {shipping_price} Ron will be charged - Urgent Cargus.
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription8: Your order should arrive within 48h of successful processing and
DeliveryAndPayment.deliveryAndPaymentDescription9: Payment for products will be made by cash on delivery, upon receipt of the package.

HowToBuy.howToBuyDescription: To place an online order, select the desired product by clicking on the button
HowToBuy.howToBuyDescription2: which appears on each product page on the site.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions1: To finalize an order, you must be already authenticated or be able to authenticate in the final stage.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions2: If you don't have an account, you will need to create one.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions3: Enter your email address and password. After authentication, follow the order completion link. Then a checkout page will open where you will choose various options related to delivery.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions4: On the checkout page, you can manage the products added to your shopping cart (through removal operations and by determining quantity).
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions5: On this page you will be able to select: the delivery method for the chosen products and the payment method.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions6: After going through all these steps, click on the 'Place order' button. After this step, the order has been placed, and the products will be sent to the address used in your registration on the site. You will receive a phone call/message for confirmation.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions8: When the order is accepted by the seller and the customer, the order is considered finalized.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructions9: If an order cannot be validated within 24 hours, it will be canceled and will not be delivered.
HowToBuy.howToBuyOrderInstructionsTitle: How do I place an order?

PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyGeneralInformationDescripti: Information provided in case personal data is collected from the data subject.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataCollection: Data collected and purpose of processing
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataCollectionDescription: Information provided in case personal data is collected from the data subject.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataCollectionDescription2: Contact details of the data protection officer.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataCollectionDescription3: Purposes for which personal data is processed.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataCollectionDescription5: Recipients or categories of data recipients.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataCollectionDescription6: Intention to transfer to a third country or international organization.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyUserRightsDescription: Right of access, rectification, and erasure of data.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyUserRightsDescription2: Right to request restriction of processing.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyUserRightsDescription4: Right to withdraw consent at any time.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyUserRightsDescription5: Right to lodge a complaint with supervisory authorities.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataDeletionRequestDescript: To request data deletion, follow the steps below:
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataDeletionRequestStep2: Provide the necessary details (name, email, etc.).
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataDeletionRequestStep4: The response will be provided within 3 days.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyDataDeletionRequestStep5: The deletion process will be carried out according to law.
PrivacyPolicy.privacyPolicyExceptionsDescription: In certain cases, data retention may be necessary according to legal obligations or legitimate interests.

Return.returnDescription2: You have the right to return any product within 14 calendar days of receiving it and may request a refund or exchange for another product. In both cases, the returned value or replaced product refers strictly to the cost of the products, excluding shipping fees.
Return.returnDescription6: Products that do not have intact labels, have broken or erased seals!
Return.returnDescription8: Products that cannot be returned for health protection or hygiene reasons (personal care/hygiene products, hair straighteners, brushes, hair elastics)
Return.returnDescription9: These measures are specific to cosmetic products as their shelf life is calculated from the first opening of the packaging, and with their use/testing, there is a risk of virus transmission through product transfer to another person, and our store cannot sell them subsequently.
Return.returnDescription12: To return a product, make sure the product exactly meets the conditions above.
Return.returnDescription14: an email informing us of the return and its reason, and mention the details by which we can identify your purchase: order number, phone number, and your name.
Return.returnDescription15: Also, please mention if you want to replace the product or get a refund.
Return.returnDescription16: Products that arrive for return in an altered form due to improper packaging will not be able to benefit from the return guarantee.
Return.returnDescription17: The package will be shipped to the address: {store_address} – Phone number: {phone_no} SC {store_name} SRL. After receiving the package, you will be contacted by a team member who will handle your product return
Return.returnDescription18: According to GEO 34/2014, the refund of a returned product will be made within 14 calendar days from receiving the withdrawal notification from the customer.
Return.returnDescription19: The refund will be made when our staff confirms receipt of the package and products in intact condition, without signs of wear or product use.
Return.returnDescription20: Refund will be made to an IBAN account in RON, indicated by the customer, or directly through Refund of Money back to the card used in the online transaction (without additional costs) within 14 working days.
Return.returnDescription21: In case of replacement with another product, it will be shipped as soon as possible (to the extent of its availability in stock).
Return.returnDescription22: If delivery terms are not met, we will notify you regarding the estimated completion date of delivery.

TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsSection13: Free shipping for orders over {free_shipping_threshold} RON
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription1: The website {store_name} is administered by S.C. {store_name} SRL
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription4: This site sells products only in Romania.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription5: Using the {store_name} site represents an acceptance of the privacy terms and conditions detailed below. If you do not agree with these conditions, please do not use our site.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription6: The site and its products are provided 'as is', without express or implied warranties.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription7: S.C. {store_name} SRL assumes no responsibility for modifying or interrupting the site.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription8: Information published on {store_name} belongs exclusively to the site and cannot be copied, transmitted, or published without the written consent of the company's legal representative.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription9: Placing an order on {store_name} implies acceptance of communication by phone or email. In case of justified problems, the seller reserves the right to cancel the order and refund the money within 5-7 days
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription10: Offers and prices displayed are valid for a maximum of 12 hours.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription11: The site and its products are provided 'as is', without express or implied warranties.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription12: S.C. {store_name} SRL assumes no responsibility for modifying or interrupting the site.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription13: Information published on {store_name} belongs exclusively to the site and cannot be copied, transmitted, or published without the written consent of the company's legal representative.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription14: Failure to comply with these conditions is sanctioned according to current legislation.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription15: Products benefit from a legal and/or commercial warranty, depending on the specifications of each product.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription16: Products can be returned within a maximum of 14 working days, if they have not been used or damaged.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription17: Disputes between the seller and consumer will be resolved amicably or in the competent court.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription18: According to Law no. 677/2001 and GDPR, personal data provided on the site are protected and used only for billing and product delivery purposes.
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription19: You have the right to request data deletion through an email to
TermsAndConditions.termsAndConditionsDescription20: This site uses cookies according to Regulation (EU) 2016/679. You can consult the cookie policy for more details.
